text: Kogda zh otchayalis' oni V yego (sodeystvii ikh pros'be), To udalilis', chtob nayedine posoveshchat'sya, I starshiy ikh skazal: "Uzhel' ne znayete, chto vash otets Vzyal klyatvu s vas pered Allakhom? I prezhde etogo s Yusufom Ne sovershili vy togo, chto nadlezhalo vam (Soglasno obeshchaniyu ottsu). A potomu ya ne pokinu etu zemlyu, Poka otets ne razreshit mne Il' ne reshit inache dlya menya Allakh: On - luchshiy iz (dayushchikh mudryye) reshen'ya
